resources.string:
\ Application created by SGT Cherryholmes
 
 2-116th Field Artillery
 Florida National Guard
 
 Version 1
 
 Contact : david.n.cherryholmes@gmail.com
Click the \'+\' Symbol to add an entry, or \'Add Standard Issue\' from the options menu at the top right.
Are you sure you want to delete the item?

string-array.item: (Choose Item Location)
